member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the gerber line reader.

member.summary: Reads the next character in the line without consuming it.

member.name: M:GerberVS.GerberLineReader.Read
member.summary: Reads the next character or the first character of the next line if at the end of the current line.

member.summary: Reads from the current line position to end of line removing new line characters.

member.summary: Reads a specified number of characters into the return string.

member.name: M:GerberVS.GerberLineReader.ReadLine(System.Char)
member.summary: Reads the current line up to but not including the first occurance of a specified character.

member.summary: Reads the line data and converts a series of digits to an integer.
member.param: number of digit in the integer

member.name: M:GerberVS.GerberLineReader.GetDoubleValue
member.summary: Reads the line data and converts a series of digits to a double precision number.

member.name: M:GerberVS.GerberLineReader.GetDoubleValue(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Reads the line data and converts a series of digits to a double precision number.
member.param: number of digits including the decimal point but excluding any prefixed sign

member.summary: Skips over white spaces.

member.summary: An irregularity was encountered, but needs no intervention.

member.summary: Comment line found.
